title: Jocuserious
author: Jocuserious
content: Just one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Bitcoin is most decentralized while many altcoins are centralized. Bitcoin is better and can reach ATH, unlike many altcoins. But in the process of gambling with altcoins, there are some altcoins that have more ROI than bitcoin. Just that some altcoins can become shit coin or a dead coin but bitcoin can not become shit or dead.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.While I agree that it is Bitcoin that should be the top choice of everybody and it's the crypto that everyone can rely in the long term. Also those who have invested early have no doubt will say it's the most profitable to them.But there will be other investors that might argue to you that it's not the most profitable to them. It could be the altcoin of their choice that have pumped a lot and that's true. If you want stability and safety, Bitcoin is the choice and it is profitable no matter what happens to this market in the long run.

comments.author: Cadaver20
comments.body: It would be better if the question was, Which coin is more profitable and trustworthy?Because you should not only look at the profit, you should also see how reliable the coin is. For example, many people made huge profits from Dogecoin, but after the hype, many people fell into huge losses. Everyone knows the current status of the once popular coin LUNA. So Bitcoin is a coin that can be blindly trusted.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.You cannot be so sure that you can earn with bitcoin since it need experience and proper training for you to became a skilled trader before you can earn, also bitcoin still a risky investment if you wanna trade it or decide to hold.Also remember that crypto doesn't stop on just bitcoin only there are to many altcoins are good to trade but you need to acquire a deep trading skills so that you can make your chances more bigger to earn some money for trading crypto on daily basis.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.Mayne for investors and early investors. But if you are talking about with the current market stance, I believe altcoins are more efficient on taking profits like can attain a 3x minimum for certain time even without a bullmarket season. If for safe and assuring investment bitcoin is the top that we wont be so nervous even when we dont check.

comments.author: benalexis12
comments.body: Bitcoin is really proven and can be said to be profitable in this business industry. That's why it's not only Bitcoin that we can profit from; we all know that. There are top altcoins such as Ethereum, BNB, Matic, OP, Arb, and others that also have the ability to give us profit in reality. So no matter what coins we trade at the moment, in my opinion, it is difficult to do trading on the exchanges because I also noticed that what is happening right now is pump and dump. If we are going to base it long-term, yes, Bitcoin is really good, but it should be in large amounts; you should have something to hold when the bull run comes. Otherwise, it's better to invest in top crypto, in my opinion.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on September 02, 2023, 08:23:12 AMBitcoin is most decentralized while many altcoins are centralized. Bitcoin is better and can reach ATH, unlike many altcoins. But in the process of gambling with altcoins, there are some altcoins that have more ROI than bitcoin. Just that some altcoins can become shit coin or a dead coin but bitcoin can not become shit or dead.You're probably right, but perhaps about bitcoin being more decentralised than other cryptocurrencies may be a delusion. Huge mining centres are owned by the same corporations like blackrock. But there is no doubt about bitcoin's stability over other altcoins. If you need stability, bitcoin is the best.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Cadaver20 on September 02, 2023, 10:03:39 AMIt would be better if the question was, Which coin is more profitable and trustworthy?Because you should not only look at the profit, you should also see how reliable the coin is. For example, many people made huge profits from Dogecoin, but after the hype, many people fell into huge losses. It's always the motivation of most investors and traders, to make a profit, the money. But it's true that we've got difference temperance and tolerance of the market. If it's about trustworthy, we all know that there are only a few options for it but the most choice will be Bitcoin.Quote from: Cadaver20 on September 02, 2023, 10:03:39 AMEveryone knows the current status of the once popular coin LUNA. So Bitcoin is a coin that can be blindly trusted.This is an issue of trust, before Luna was truly known and trusted and they're even always in the news that said of purchasing a lot of Bitcoin. Not until everything has come to an end and the true agenda of the devs came out.

comments.author: Rabata
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.Those who are experienced investors can certainly assess what is suitable for investment but many newbies may lack the knowledge. I just want to say that Bitcoin is the only decentralized currency with guaranteed investment. We generally know that there is no trust in altcoins. At any time those altcoins can be hacked or scammed. We've seen two major currency scams in 2022 where people lost everything. There is also no guarantee that such efforts will continue in the future with new coins. So there is no alternative to investing in Bitcoin to risk free your money.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: Bitcoin is the locomotive that drives the market. The others are the wagons attached to it. Bear and bull seasons depend on its movement. So, Bitcoin is not only the most profitable currency, it also has a psychological impact. That's why it's always in the first place for those making long-term investment plans. As for altcoins, certain good choices like Ethereum and BNB are considered good choices by cryptocurrency investors in general. I wish you good luck...

comments.author: khiholangkang
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.What you say cannot be debated because we have seen the evidence, and it is not only early investors, investors who jump in at the end of 2022 will also benefit from bitcoin, and anyone who goes into bitcoin will definitely benefit as long as he has an investment plan for long-term.Quote from: Cadaver20 on September 02, 2023, 10:03:39 AMIt would be better if the question was, Which coin is more profitable and trustworthy?Because you should not only look at the profit, you should also see how reliable the coin is. For example, many people made huge profits from Dogecoin, but after the hype, many people fell into huge losses. Everyone knows the current status of the once popular coin LUNA. So Bitcoin is a coin that can be blindly trusted.In other words, investing in altcoins can also get a decent ROI, but for those who jump in early and or at the right moment, such as Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and Luna which have experienced a crash, previously people who bought Luna at the start will definitely get big profits if calculated up to the last ATH.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.Practice more to make quality posts on this forum mate, everyone knows that Bitcoin (BTC) is the best coin and is the genesis of everything that exists today on the crypto side. You posted this on the altcoin discussion board but talked about Bitcoin (BTC), LOL. I mean, let's have a serious discussion about this, whether discussing L-1 or L-2 projects which are the other pillars of the crypto side besides $BTC.

comments.author: Heulahee
comments.body: I think when Bitcoin came to the market, bitcoin was just hyped at first, but the rapid growth of its trading led to a change in the future, and eventually it became the biggest coin in the world. And that will be further best, that no one can take its place.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: Most of my savings are in Bitcoin. Cant trust keeping my funds in altcoins these days cause of the market volatility though there are more profitable during a bullrun. We are still in a bear market and dipping lower day by day safest way is for one to store most of his funds in Btc,Think it is more profitable in this type of situation.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.You know there are times and seasons for everything. So Bitcoin had its early days where the prices were very cheap and a dollar could get you a few hundreds or possibly thousand units of it, but its not at that point anymore, it has gained value over time through adoption and relevance. Just like Bitcoin, altcoins are at their early stages where their value is not yet known or shown/made public, although its not every project that will be succesful as Bitcoin but a comprehensive research will show you which is worthy of alternating Bitcoin with, if you can research more, you'll get a coin that has a more relevant value than the millions flying around with no indept token value or solution.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.There's no question about that. But this is the Altcoin Discussion so I guess we should be discussing what Altcoin was the most profitable cryptocurrency of all time. I think it will depend on the era of entry. If an investor entered the cryptocurrency market during the time when Ethereum was way cheap then he is also reaping the rewards by now. The same goes for those who trusted BNB upon its arrival in the crypto industry. From literally cents to now hundreds of dollars it even went further by $600+ which is unimaginable. I have my share of regrets for not buying them at their inception but past is past and we just have to live with the present now and probably not make the same mistake again.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Although I'm a Bitcoin holder, but I have to disagree if you say Bitcoin is coin that more profitable than other cryptocurrencies.Currently Bitcoin price only increased for 0.25% in the last 24 hours and declined for 0.5% in the last 7 days. While SafePal price is increased for 8% in the last 24 hours and Toncoin price is increased for 29% in the last 7 days.Of course during Bull run Bitcoin price could increase triple, but don't forget other altcoins can increase higher than triple.

comments.author: red4slash
comments.body: After I got to know bitcoin and invested in it, I was able to fix my problems about finances, although it was not significant, it was very helpful. I will not forget that I also benefited from other coins, such as ETH and BNB, even if they are meme coins or shitcoins, because several times I also entered there and was able to take advantage. For a long time, bitcoin was promising and it was a pity for me to miss it, especially when bitcoin had a deep decline, it was an opportunity for me to go in and buy it and then I held it for a long time.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 02, 2023, 08:18:07 AMJust one bitcoinBitcoin is the most profitable crypto to all investors. Bitcoin is the first digital asset to hit the crypto market. In fact it was more profitable for its early investors.Bitcoin is not only the most profitable coin because Altcoins are able to offer higher and faster profits than Bitcoin.  But in this case there is a very high risk, compared to which investing in Bitcoin is much safer. By investing in Bitcoin a person is not able to make huge profits from it very quickly but investing in Altcoins can make high profits.  But on the other hand many times Altcoins are found to be scams in which case an investor can lose all his investment
